title: Unnamed Gallo-Roman villa (Montlauzun)
description: Majonelle, Cm. Montlauzun, France, was the site of a long-lived villa of substantial size. According to M. Labrousse writing in PECS, the presence of a "Byzantine coin of Phokis" denotes a very late occupation.

properties.description: A positive identification of the sub-commune location noted in the Barrington Atlas directory
properties.title: Center point of location
